quoteData.quote: The cycle ends here. We must be better than this.
quoteData.author: Kratos

quoteData.quote: Do not be sorry. Be better.
quoteData.author: Kratos

quoteData.quote: The greatest weapon in the fight against chaos is order.
quoteData.author: Kratos

quoteData.quote: Pain is a reminder that we are finite. Death gives meaning to our lives.
quoteData.author: Kratos
